thread.title: Travelzoo Launches A Nationwide Search For Five Lucky Names
thread.title_full: Travelzoo Launches A Nationwide Search For Five Lucky Names

title: Travelzoo Launches A Nationwide Search For Five Lucky Names
text: Travelzoo Launches A Nationwide Search For Five Lucky Names By PR Newswire | 08/11/15 - 11:49 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK , Aug. 11, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Travelzoo (NASDAQ: TZOO), a global Internet media company, launched a nationwide search today for people with five lucky names. One winner for each name will win a 5-night luxury Hawaii getaway for two courtesy of Starwood Hotels & Resorts Hawaii. The five #luckynames are: Maria Martinez Priya Patel "Chances are you know someone with one of the names we selected," said Justin Soffer , vice president of marketing for Travelzoo. "Unlike most contests where the winners are chosen completely at random, we thought it would be fun to choose the winning names first. And this contest is perfectly suited for social media since it will inspire people to share and tag friends who are eligible to enter."To share with friends or if you have one the names listed above, you can enter the sweepstakes at www.travelzoo.com/blog/luckynames . About Travelzoo Travelzoo Inc. is a global Internet media company. With more than 27 million members in North America , Europe , and Asia Pacific and 25 offices worldwide, TravelzooÂ® publishes deals from more than 2,000 travel, entertainment and local companies. Travelzoo Deal Experts review offers to find the best deals and confirm their true value. In Asia Pacific , Travelzoo is independently owned and operated by Travelzoo ( Asia ) Ltd. and Travelzoo Japan K.K. under a license agreement with Travelzoo Inc. About Starwood Hotels & Resorts Hawaii With 11 properties across the diverse Hawaiian Islands of Oahu , Maui , Kauai and the Big Island, Starwood Hotels & Resorts Hawaii offers the best hotel destinations to celebrate romance, reconnect with family, focus on business or launch an adventure. Located on or just footsteps away from the Islands' best beaches, Starwood Hotels & Resorts in Hawaii is a collection of iconic and historic hotels and resorts - properties with expansive and breathtaking backdrops, innovative guest programming and luxurious amenities representing internationally renowned hotel brands from Sheraton, Westin, Luxury Collection and St. Regis. For more information about Starwood Hotels & Resorts in Hawaii , please call (866) 716-8140 or visit starwoodhawaii.com. For booking information please call (866) 716-8140 or visit www.starwoodhawaii.com .
